channel.title: SysCape V.3 REAL GS STANCES, RANGE MAGE MELEE FOLLOW, ALL SKILLS WORKING 100% &
channel.description:
[CENTER][B][SIZE=5]SysCape Version 3.[/SIZE][/B] [/CENTER]
[SIZE=3]Hi Moparscape, im here to release my firts and last server, since im bored of RSPS coding.. This release is Delta based, and inspired mostly on oblivionpk (for me one one of the best RSPS out). I didnt copy anythhing of OBPK released source, i just got their ideas and pasted on my project. [COLOR=Red]Note: Anyone have the autority to post this client release on any other community without my permission.[/COLOR] So here we go:
[size=14pt][u][b]Server Download (V2.0)[/b][/u][/size] Click [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Cy40VpdD5U&feature=player_embedded]here[/url] to download!
[size=14pt][u][b]Client Download (V1.0)[/b][/u][/size] Click [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Cy40VpdD5U&feature=player_embedded]here[/url] to download!
[B]Credits:[/B] 30% Delta for hes great base. 10% Sanity for hes aswome ideas on making servers. Rest % for me to build this great and stable server.
[/SIZE][CENTER][SIZE=3][B]What's this server offer:[/B]
-Dupes fixed -Auto banning ips system [/SIZE] [SIZE=3][COLOR=black]-Server files on a separated folder, for any mistakes (bin)[/COLOR][/SIZE][SIZE=3][COLOR=black] -Dragon full helm, almost all PVP armour and weapons. -Edgeville doungeon with NPC (slayer master) -Island with mosses and worrior elfs -Full canifis. -Full Taverly doungeon with npcs. [/COLOR][/SIZE] [SIZE=3][COLOR=black]-14 custom quest(you can do ::quests if you want to get em all done)[/COLOR][/SIZE][SIZE=3] -No antilech 100% editable client/server. -Donator zone -Disabled multi-logging in -Multi-attacking barrage/burst with correct freezing -Perfected Ancient magics -Timers on starters no trade/drop/death for 30 minutes -Only normal commands giveadmin/mod/donator - jail - ban- mute etc. -Perfect slayer tower/tasks with working gem -The best jail system out, it teles you back once you walk a square out of the house. -Godsword specials, walking, stances, running. -King Black Dragon in the correct spot -Barrow effects -Barrows minigame with working spade -All dragon weapons special -Perfected Range + Mage -Almost perfect combat, needs some changes. -Slayer tower full -All 317 skills working -Skill zone just like OBPK (great spot) -Anti-null -Full abbyss runecrafting 100% working -BigBoss custom minigame, drops rarest armour and weapons -All dragon weapon special attacks -Only the real rs customs, no stupid useless customs -Kalphite queen (cave at alkhadi) -Perfected PvP and PvN -Shops at the principal cities (varrock, falador, edge) -Teleports to every single places on the map -Client with many options, hp bars, color text and much more! -JAD with 63 waves -Assault with 5% drop rates (no boring shop) -Fight pits and pest control 100% working with timers and shop -King dagganoths with real way to get to em, agresive monsters, and real drops! [/SIZE] [SIZE=3][COLOR=black]-Logs of every single command staff do. -Full NPC drops with drops just like real rs. -Green, Red, Blue and black dragons full working with drops. -Lunar magic 100% -Vengance and vengance on others 100% with GFXs -Custom crown for owner. -All prayer working
[B]And much more, just comment, rep me, download and test!
Main pictures link: [/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][URL=http://s759.photobucket.com/albums/xx236/xsystex/]http://s759.photobucket.com/albums/xx236/xsystex/[/URL] [SIZE=3][COLOR=black][B]Some pictures: [IMG]http://i759.photobucket.com/albums/xx236/xsystex/0031-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i759.photobucket.com/albums/xx236/xsystex/0030.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i759.photobucket.com/albums/xx236/xsystex/0029.png[/img]

[font=Verdana][b]ALMOST FORGOT THIS, ABOUT THE "FREEZING BUG" AT THE MAKEOVER GUY, ITS ALREADY FIXED ITS JUST I FORGOT TO EDIT THE WELCOME SCREEN SORRY! LOL[/b][/font]
Videos maded by my staff and players:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Cy40VpdD5U
And finally here is the download link: [size=14pt][u][b]Server Download (V2.0)[/b][/u][/size] Click [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Cy40VpdD5U&feature=player_embedded]here[/url] to download!
[size=14pt][u][b]Client Download (V1.0)[/b][/u][/size] Click [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Cy40VpdD5U&feature=player_embedded]here[/url] to download!
[B][SIZE=5]Hope you all enjoy it, please comment and rep =)[/SIZE][/B]:D:D:D [/LEFT] [SIZE=3][COLOR=black] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
